hero.title: Websites & Frontend
hero.subtitle:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 5+ years of experience - strong focus
on creating innovative and scalable web solutions

motto.pt1: Helping businesses creating impactful web experiences that drive customer engagement and success across all digital channels.
motto.pt2: My goal is to deliver digital experiences that not only engage and inspire but also achieve tangible results for my clients. When working on websites, I place a strong emphasis on crafting unique layouts, captivating interactions, and good use of typography, blend together these elements to create a seamless user experience that leaves a lasting impression.

bentoBox.title: Frontend & UX
bentoBox.desc: Developing pixel perfects UI interfaces and prototypes that look great on any device in collaboration with designers and backend developers to ensure seamless functionality and a smooth user experience.

bentoBox.title: Backend
bentoBox.desc: Building and maintaining the server-side of web applications, handling databases, APIs, and the logic that powers the functionality behind the scenes

bentoBox.title: Website Creation & Maintenance
bentoBox.desc: Creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites that engage their target audience, from design to deployment and secure maintenance.

bentoBox.title: Tools
bentoBox.desc: Using a broad variety of industry standard tools to streamline the process of creating and maintaining modern frontend applications.
